description: Crunchy chicken schnitzel with sriracha slaw in a brioche bun. These enticing gluten-free chicken burgers can be enjoyed by the whole family.
name: Gluten-Free Chicken Schnitzel Burgers With Spicy Slaw & Pickles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g Woolworths Free From Gluten chicken schnitzels
4 Woolworths Free From Gluten White Burger Bun bases

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper
Remove schnitzels from packet, then place on tray. Bake for 20 minutes, turning halfway through cooking, or until golden and cooked through.
Meanwhile, combine mayonnaise and sriracha sauce in a small bowl, reserving one-third of the mixture.
Combine coleslaw, coriander, lime juice and remaining mayonnaise mixture in a large bowl.
Top 4 bun bases with reserved mayonnaise mixture, schnitzel and coleslaw. Sandwich with bun tops. Serve with pickle.
